titleStmt.title: Propositions concerning the subject of baptism and consociation of churches collected and confirmed out of the word of God, by a synod of elders and messengers of the churches in Massachusets-Colony in New-England ; assembled at Boston, according to appointment of the honoured General Court, in the year 1662, at a General Court held at Boston in New-England the 8th of October, 1662.
titleStmt.author: Mitchel, Jonathan, 1624-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for Hezekiah Vsher at Boston in New-England,

notesStmt.note: Chiefly the work of Jonathan Mitchel.
Caption title, p. 1, "The answer of the elders and other messengers of the churches, assembled at Boston in the year 1662, to the questions propounded to them by order of the honoured General Court."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
